verses.verse: And the lot <S%H1486><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> fell <S%H3318><s%> from Jordan <S%H3383><s%> by Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> to the water <S%H4325><s%> of Jericho <S%H3405><s%> on the east, <S%H4217><s%> to the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> that goes <S%H5927><s%> up from Jericho <S%H3405><s%> throughout mount <S%H2022><s%> Bethel, <S%H1008><s%>
And goes <S%H3318><s%> out from Bethel <S%H1008><s%> to Luz, <S%H3870><s%> and passes <S%H5674><s%> along to the borders <S%H1366><s%> of Archi <S%H757><s%> to Ataroth, <S%H5852><s%>

And goes <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%> to the coast <S%H1366><s%> of Japhleti, <S%H3311><s%> to the coast <S%H1366><s%> of Bethhoron <S%H1032><s%> the nether, <S%H8481><s%> and to Gezer; <S%H1507><s%> and the goings <S%H8444><s%> out thereof are at the sea. <S%H3220><s%>
So the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> and Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> took their inheritance. <S%H5157><s%>

And the border <S%H1366><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%> was thus: even the border <S%H1366><s%> of their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> on the east <S%H4217><s%> side was Atarothaddar, <S%H5853><s%> to Bethhoron <S%H1032><s%> the upper; <S%H5945><s%>

And the border <S%H1366><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out toward the sea <S%H3220><s%> to Michmethah <S%H4366><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> side; and the border <S%H1366><s%> went <S%H5437><s%> about <S%H5437><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%> to Taanathshiloh, <S%H8387><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> by it on the east <S%H4217><s%> to Janohah; <S%H3239><s%>

And it went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from Janohah <S%H3239><s%> to Ataroth, <S%H5852><s%> and to Naarath, <S%H5292><s%> and came <S%H6293><s%> to Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> and went <S%H3318><s%> out at Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

The border <S%H1366><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> out from Tappuah <S%H8599><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%> to the river <S%H5158><s%> Kanah; <S%H7071><s%> and the goings <S%H8444><s%> out thereof were at the sea. <S%H3220><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> by their families. <S%H4940><s%>

And the separate <S%H3995><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> were among <S%H8432><s%> the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>

And they drove <S%H3423><s%> not out the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> that dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in Gezer: <S%H1507><s%> but the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> the Ephraimites <S%H669><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> under tribute. <S%H4522><s%>
